description_html: Mason offers a new concept in wallcovering: Each 16” x 16” tile is beautifully handmade of rapidly renewable abaca pulp, which makes them light enough for easy installation—either continuously straight, crosshatched, or mitered—with conventional starch-based wallpaper adhesive. Bamboo stalks shifting in the breeze inspired the organic design. Available in two natural colorways, with the unlimited option for custom colors.
